attributes.action: remove VAT on theatre schools and stop taxing our children's health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adding VAT to theatre school fees makes classes less affordable for the target families whom we are helping to access health and fitness activities and life skills. This is a tax on children's health.

Razzamataz Theatre Schools are now raising a national petition against the charging of VAT on theatre schools. To add your voice to the campaign, please sign up now!



Dragons’ Den multi-millionaire businessman, Duncan Bannatyne, is also enthusiastically supporting the campaign.

“The health and fitness of our children needs to be at the top of the political agenda,“
